pullRequest.title: init custom gradle tooling model
pullRequest.bodyText:
This branch aims to expose a custom model containing project structure. This model is generating using the gradle API.
This allows gradle users to:

run/debug tests from IDE
run/debug main Quarkus.run (simple / multi-module)

This branch closes:

#8737, #9738, #8950 related to run tests
#10602, #10123 related to run main

@aloubyansky can you have a look? this should not evolve more (excepts with review comment and some test additions)

nodes.bodyText: Is it not available in the model?
